thread.title: Prashant Desai

author: Prashant Desai
title: Prashant Desai
text: Inder worked very hard to get the good air fair and specially he got me the best itinerary as per my wish with my specified airline. He is great person, very courteous and provided the best services. I would definitely will come back to this site again for my future travels. I wish him all the best. Thanks to other team members like Lalit who initially helped me and others for your service. Keep up your good work.
